mapper.select: select post_id, id, title, post_date, contents, start_date, due_date, status, type from Post
select id, post_id, id, post_date, contents, start_date, due_date, status, type from Post where title like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into Post(id, title, contents, start_date, due_date, status, type) values(#{id},#{title},#{contents}, #{start_date},#{due_date}, #{status}, #{type})
